database.selectLocation: Please select the data storage location
database.reselectLocation: Select the data storage location again
database.reselectConfirm: Are you sure you want to select the data storage location again?
database.storageHint: User tracks and track fingerprints will be stored here. Please ensure that this folder has enough space.
database.existingHint: If the FRKB database folder already exists under the target folder, the existing database content will be used directly.
database.locationRetain: The current data storage location remains in the original location, which can be manually deleted or selected to continue using.
database.cannotRead: The database located at this location cannot be read.
database.possibleDamage: The database may have been moved or its necessary file structure may be damaged. If you are certain that the database has not been moved, selecting this location again will attempt to repair the database.
database.oldVersionWarning: Detected old version database, the old version database will no longer be supported. Do you want to upgrade the database to the new version?
database.upgradeInfo: The upgraded database will retain the original audio content, but will clear the old audio fingerprint data. You may need to rescan the audio files, and the fingerprint analysis performance will be significantly improved after upgrading.

cloudSync.notConfiguredHint: Cloud sync not configured. Opening settings...
cloudSync.applyEmailInstruction: Please email in English or Chinese to request or recover your userKey

errors.cannotConnect: Cannot connect to cloud sync service
errors.alreadyLatest: Up to date, no sync needed
errors.tooFrequent: Sync requests are too frequent. Please try again later.
errors.sensitiveOperationTooFrequent: Sensitive operation requests are too frequent. Please try again later.
errors.sessionNotExist: Diff session does not exist or has expired
errors.keyMismatch: The current userKey does not match the session
errors.rateLimitWarning8: Kind reminder: 8 syncs in the last 5 minutes. This is the 9th. To avoid rate limiting, please start again in {seconds} seconds
errors.rateLimitWarning9: Kind reminder: 9 syncs in the last 5 minutes. This is the 10th. Please start again in {seconds} seconds

library.deduplicateHint: All tracks that have been imported and added to the audio fingerprint library will be compared, and duplicate tracks will not be imported, even if they have been deleted previously.
library.fingerprintHint: The imported tracks will be analyzed for audio fingerprints based on their content, and the analysis results will be permanently stored in the database for deduplication comparison, even if the tracks themselves have been deleted, the analysis results will still exist.
library.nameRequired: You must provide the playlist or folder name.
library.nameAlreadyExists: A playlist or folder named {name} already exists at this location. Please choose a different name.
library.nameInvalidChars: Name cannot contain the following characters: < > : " / \ | ? * or control characters
library.notExistOnDisk: This playlist/folder does not exist on disk, it may have been manually deleted.

tracks.title: Tracks
tracks.noTracksHint: Import tracks into a playlist, or import by dragging folders or audio files.
tracks.confirmDelete: Are you sure to permanently delete?
tracks.confirmDeleteSelected: Are you sure to permanently delete the selected tracks?
tracks.confirmDeletePlaying: Are you sure to permanently delete the currently playing track?
tracks.confirmDeleteAllAbove: Are you sure to permanently delete all tracks above this track?
tracks.deleteHint: (The track will be deleted from the disk, but the audio fingerprint will still be retained.)
tracks.deleteHintPlural: (The tracks will be deleted from the disk, but the audio fingerprints will still be retained)
tracks.cannotPlay: This file cannot be played. Would you like to delete it directly?
tracks.cannotPlayHint: (The file content is not audio or the file is corrupted)
tracks.fileExistsReplace: '{name}' already exists in the target folder. Continue with replacement?
tracks.replaceHint: (The playlist or folder being replaced will be deleted.)

player.hideControlsShowWaveform: Hide the play control area, showing a longer waveform
player.endMustBeGreater: End position must be greater than start position

fingerprints.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear the current track fingerprint database?
fingerprints.notValidFile: This is not a valid track fingerprint database file.
fingerprints.importMergeHint: After importing, the new track fingerprint library will be merged with the old one.
fingerprints.exportHint: The exported file can be imported and merged by selecting 'Import track fingerprint database file‌' in FRKB on other devices.
fingerprints.currentCount: There are currently {count} tracks in the track fingerprint library
fingerprints.analysisHint: Only perform audio fingerprint analysis on all audio files in the target folder and its subfolders, and store the analysis results in the database, without modifying any file content or structure in the target folder.

import.waitForTask: Please wait for the current task to complete‌
import.scannedTracks: Total tracks scanned under the folder: {count}
import.removedDuplicates: Removed duplicate tracks by comparing audio fingerprints: {count}
import.fingerprintAdded: New additions to the audio fingerprint library: {count}
import.fingerprintCurrent: Current count in the audio fingerprint library: {count}
import.analysisFailedHint: (usually due to corrupted file content or errors during transmission)
import.playlistImported: Total tracks imported to the playlist: {count}
import.fingerprintNotAddedHint: (already exist in the sound fingerprint library)

update.networkIssue: It may be due to network connection issues. Please check your network connection or try using a proxy server.
update.downloadCompleted: Download completed. FRKB will automatically update after restart.
update.updateDownloaded: Update has been downloaded. FRKB will automatically upgrade on the next startup.
update.doNotCheckFor7Days: Do Not Check for Updates for 7 Days

shortcuts.globalCallShortcut: Shortcut for focusing/minimizing the FRKB window
shortcuts.shortcutSetFailed: Failed to set shortcut, possibly due to conflict or error.

recycleBin.confirmEmpty: Are you sure to empty the recycle bin?

about.author: Author: Coder 'Programmer/DJ'
